content: {"locationId": "8806", "organizationId": "7247", "name": "First Baptist Church Madill", "address1": "405 E Main St", "address2": "", "city": "Madill", "state": "OK", "zipCode": "73446", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "34.0918652", "longitude": "-96.7678461", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Carter County, Johnston County, Marshall County", "languages": "English, Spanish", "features": "Parking Available", "aboutUs": "We are a food pantry location and distribute a bag of groceries weekly to registered families.  We have a check in window where a representative of the family must check in. A numbered card is given to them and we then send them to the next door to pick up the bag of groceries.  While there is a ramp up to the sidewalk, it is pretty steep.  We usually have someone available to carry the groceries to the car.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Phyllis", "contactPhone": "580-564-5668", "contactEmail": "phyllismorse091348@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Shopper Choice, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 64, "regionName": "Regional Food Bank of Oklahoma", "logoBlobNameSmall": "b268ff1b-39fa-45f4-a37e-421975c3f339.png", "website": "https://www.regionalfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Central Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "CT", "offsetHours": "-5", "schedules": ["Tuesday 4:00 PM-6:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
